content.content_data: The much awaited iPB7 is now in final testing at the iPulse offices, and is due for release during Q2 2013. With all the features and models of the iPB6, the iPB7 brings a rugged housing (IP65/66 rated) and a massive 3.4 inch landscape screen to the party! Pop in at our offices to find out more about this amazing new product!
